data.title: Snoop Dogg House – A Look Inside the Luxurious Life of a Hip-Hop Icon
data.meta_description: Take a virtual tour of Snoop Dogg's stunning home, featuring impressive architecture, spacious interiors, and top-of-the-line amenities. Discover the rapper's lavish lifestyle and glimpse his glamorous estate.
data.text:
Welcome to the Snoop Dogg House, where the gin and juice flow like a fountain, and the chronic is always on tap! This crib belongs to none other than the Doggfather himself. He is a well-known American rapper, songwriter, and actor who has established a reputation in the music business.

Calvin Cordozar Broadus Jr., also known as Snoop Dogg, is renowned for his expensive lifestyle, including his opulent California residence and successful music career. It’s where he drops it like it’s hot, chills out, and kicks back with his homies.You might even catch a peek at his dependable sidekick, the legendary…Martha Stewart, if you’re lucky!

In this article, we will explore Snoop Dogg’s house and his luxurious lifestyle.

Where the Dogg Lives: Address and Cost of Snoop Dogg’s House

Currently, Snoop Dogg’s house is located in Diamond Bar, California. The house features four bedrooms, four bathrooms, and a swimming pool. Snoop Dogg bought the house in 1998 for $720,000, and its value has quadrupled to $1.7 million in 2023.

Spread across 2.8 acres and covering 4,000 square feet, this mansion screams every synonym of luxury and style.

From G-Funk to Fine Living: A Peek into the Interior of Snoop Dogg’s House

Situated in the prestigious gated community called “The Country,” Snoop Dogg’s house in Diamond Bar is an impressive estate that exudes luxury and sophistication. The mansion was built in 1977 and has been his residence for over 20 years.

The home’s interior perfectly blends contemporary and traditional styles with high-end finishes and fixtures. The hardwood floors, crown mouldings, and intricate tile work add a touch of elegance to the living spaces, while the modern appliances and technology provide convenience and comfort.

Snoop Dogg’s House – Living Area

As you enter the mansion, you are greeted by a stunning view of the main living room. The living room features a two-storey ceiling with huge windows that let in ample natural light. The living room has plush sofas and armchairs, creating a warm and inviting atmosphere.

The mansion also features a formal dining room perfect for hosting large dinner parties. The dining room features a large table that can seat up to 12 people and is decorated with elegant chandeliers and artwork.

One of the standout features of Snoop Dogg’s house is his home theatre. The home theatre is on the mansion’s lower level and features comfortable leather recliner chairs and a large screen perfect for watching movies or sports events. The home theatre also features a state-of-the-art sound system, which makes the viewing experience even more immersive.

Dogg’s Kitchen

The kitchen is another impressive feature of Snoop Dogg’s house. The large and spacious kitchen has plenty of counter space and storage. The kitchen features high-end appliances, including a Viking stove and a Sub-Zero refrigerator. The kitchen also features a sizable island perfect for preparing meals or entertaining guests.

Master Bedroom

The mansion’s master bedroom, which is on the upper level, has a sizable four-poster bed and a fireplace. Also, the master bedroom features a sizable balcony with breathtaking views of the neighbourhood. The master bathroom is also luxurious, featuring a large bathtub and a walk-in shower.

Amenities in Snoop Dogg’s House

The house features four bedrooms, four bathrooms, a gourmet kitchen, a formal dining room, a spacious living area, and a home theatre, among other amenities. The master suite comprises a four-poster bed, vaulted ceilings, a fireplace, and a private balcony overlooking the backyard.

Inside the Dogg House, the walls are adorned with gold records, and there’s a massive TV in the centre of the living room, always playing the latest sports games or classic movies.

The kitchen is stocked with all of Snoop’s favourite snacks, from chicken and waffles to tacos and hot dogs, and of course, there’s always a fresh batch of brownies baking in the oven.

But that’s not all – Snoop Dogg House has a few surprises up its sleeve. Head down to the basement, and you’ll find a full-sized basketball court with a Lakers-themed mural on the wall.

And if you’re feeling adventurous, why not take a dip in Snoop’s indoor pool? It’s always set to a perfect 420 degrees, and the underwater speakers play nothing but the smoothest beats.

The backyard of Snoop Dogg’s house is just as impressive as the interior. The backyard features a large pool, perfect for swimming laps or lounging in the sun. The outdoor kitchen is another impressive feature of the backyard, which features a large grill, a sink, and a refrigerator, making it perfect for hosting outdoor parties.

In addition to the outdoor kitchen, the backyard also features a large patio area, perfect for outdoor dining or lounging. The patio area is furnished with comfortable outdoor furniture, making it the perfect place to relax and enjoy the California sunshine.

Living the High Life with Snoop Dogg: A Journey Through His House Collection

Over the years, Snoop Dogg has amassed a significant fortune and invested in various properties, including residential ones. Besides his main residence, the Long Beach mansion he’s owned since 1994, Snoop Dogg has owned several other houses and properties.

Claremont California House

One of his notable properties is a mansion located in Claremont, California. The property features five bedrooms, five bathrooms, a gym, and a swimming pool. The mansion also has a detached guest house and a tennis court. Snoop Dogg purchased the mansion in 1998 for $720,000 and sold it for $1.83 million in 2007.

The exterior of the mansion is a view to behold. The house has a classic Mediterranean style, combining brick and stucco walls. The mansion also features a large circular driveway lined with Palm trees and leads to the main entrance. The entrance to the mansion is grand, with large double doors that open up to a large foyer.

The Church – California

Snoop Dogg bought a modest three-bedroom house a few years after buying his dream home in Diamond Bar, located on the same block. Although it might seem strange that the rapper bought a home near his primary residence, many people were shocked when he turned the estate into a working recording studio.

Snoop spends most of his time in the studio, which he calls his “Church,” which is still a special location for him. The mansion also features a recording studio where Snoop Dogg creates and records his music. The recording studio is fully equipped with state-of-the-art equipment and features soundproof walls to ensure the music is not disturbed by external noise.

Other Properties and Businesses Owned by Snoop Dogg

In 2015, Snoop Dogg purchased a home in the Hollywood Hills for $2.15 million. The house features four bedrooms, four bathrooms, and a stunning view of Los Angeles. The mansion possesses a swimming pool, a hot tub, and an outdoor fireplace.

Aside from these properties, Snoop Dogg also owned a condo in New York City, which he sold in 2015 for $2.33 million. The condo featured three bedrooms and two bathrooms and was located in the Chelsea neighbourhood of Manhattan.

In addition to his real estate investments, Snoop Dogg owns a marijuana production company called Leafs by Snoop. The company produces marijuana products, including flowers, concentrates, and edibles. Snoop Dogg is also an investor in the cannabis delivery service Eaze.

Overall, Snoop Dogg’s investments in real estate and cannabis have helped him amass a significant fortune. He continues to be a successful entrepreneur, and his business ventures continue to expand.

In 2019, Snoop Dogg added another property to his portfolio when he purchased a mansion in Chatsworth, California, for $5.3 million. The mansion comprises six bedrooms, eight bathrooms, a pool, and a spa. The property also has a guest house and a four-car garage.

Snoop Dogg invests in real estate and other business ventures. He is also a philanthropist, and in 2018, he donated $1 million to the Mothers Against Police Brutality organisation.

In addition to his real estate and cannabis businesses, Snoop Dogg is also a brand ambassador for various companies, including Adidas and Tanqueray Gin. He has also appeared in several movies and TV shows, including Training Day, Starsky & Hutch, and Empire.

The Net Worth of Snoop Dogg

Snoop Dogg has also made massive wealth; currently, Snoop Dogg’s Net Worth in 2023 is $165 million.

The rapper is known for his love of cars, and he has a large collection of luxury vehicles, including a Rolls-Royce Ghost, a Cadillac Escalade, and a Tesla Model X. The garage is spacious and can accommodate several cars, ensuring that Snoop’s car collection is always protected and secure.

Latest News about Snoop Dogg

In March 2022, Snoop Dogg became a board member and content developer for FaZe Clan for the first time. When the transaction was made, Snoop Dogg cited his son Cordell Broadus as the primary facilitator and brought him to the FaZe Clan.

However, in 2023, a lot transpired. After the company announced cutbacks in early 2022 and initially decided to go public in the summer of 2022, FaZe Clan stock has declined dramatically. However, the esports organisation’s 2022 financial statement showed a substantial loss.

Snoop Dogg told FaZe Holdings Inc. on March 29, 2023, that he is withdrawing immediately from the organisation’s board of directors. Inconsistencies with the firm or its affiliates did not lead to Snoop Dogg’s resignation.

Conclusion

Snoop Dogg has used his mansion as a location for several music videos and television shows, including his reality show “Snoop Dogg’s Father Hood,” which aired on E! in 2007. The show gave viewers a glimpse into Snoop Dogg’s personal life and relationships with his wife and children.

Snoop Dogg’s success as a rapper and entrepreneur has declared him a cultural icon and an inspiration to many. He continues to push boundaries and break barriers, both in his music and in his business ventures. Snoop Dogg is still going strong in his 50s, and his followers are excited to see what he has in store for them next.

FAQ’s

Where is Snoop Dogg's house?

Currently, Snoop Dogg resides in Diamond Bar in California.

Does Snoop Dogg still live in the same house?

Yes, Snoop Dogg has been living in Diamond Bar Mansion for 20 years.

How much is Snoop Dogg's estate worth?

Snoop Dogg’s net worth in 2023 is $150 million.
